languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g} reflect a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to solve various problems: manage equipment, detect small details, open locked containers, and even influence conversations. A skill score determines how proficient a character is — the higher the skill score, the easier it will be to pass corresponding skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.
languages.original_text: Навыки отражают возможности персонажа решать различные задачи: управляться с техникой, подмечать мелкие детали, открывать запертые контейнеры и даже влиять на своих собеседников. Показатель навыка определяет, насколько хорошо персонаж владеет им — чем выше значение навыка, тем проще будет совершать связанные с ним проверки.

traits.locale_text: A skill represents a creature's ability to perform an ordinary task, such as climb a wall, sneak down a hallway, or spot an intruder. The number of ranks possessed by a creature in a given skill represents its proficiency in that skill. As a creature gains Hit Dice, it also gains additional skill ranks that can be added to its skills.

A skill represents a creature's ability to perform an ordinary task, such as climb a wall, sneak down a hallway, or spot an intruder. The number of ranks possessed by a creature in a given skill represents its proficiency in that skill.

A skill represents a creature's ability to perform an ordinary task, such as climb a wall, sneak down a hallway, or spot an intruder. The number of ranks possessed by a creature in a given skill represents its proficiency in that skill.

A skill score determines how proficient a character is — the higher the skill score, the easier it will be to pass corresponding skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} spiegeln die Fähigkeit eines Charakters wider, verschiedene Probleme zu lösen: Ausrüstung verwalten, kleine Details erkennen, verschlossene Behälter öffnen, und sogar Gespräche beeinflussen. Ein Fertigkeitswert bestimmt, wie gut ein Charakter ist – je höher der Fertigkeitswert, desto einfacher ist es, entsprechende {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Fertigkeitsproben{/g} zu schaffen.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g} reflect a character's ability to solve various problems: manage equipment, detect small details, open locked containers, and even influence conversations. A skill score determines how proficient a character is — the higher the skill score, the easier it will be to pass corresponding skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} spiegeln die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Charakters wider, verschiedene Probleme zu lösen: Ausrüstung verwalten, kleine Details erkennen, verschlossene Behälter öffnen, und sogar Gespräche beeinflussen. Ein Fertigkeitswert bestimmt, wie gut ein Charakter ist – je höher der Fertigkeitswert, desto einfacher ist es, entsprechende {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Fertigkeitsproben{/g} zu schaffen.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} reflètent la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un personnage à résoudre différents types de problèmes : gérer l'équipement, détecter de petits détails, ouvrir des conteneurs verrouillés et même influencer des conversations. Le score d'une compétence détermine le degré de maîtrise du personnage : plus il est élevé, plus il est facile pour lui de réussir les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de compétences correspondants.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g} reflect a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to solve various problems: manage equipment, detect small details, open locked containers, and even influence conversations. A skill score determines how proficient a character is — the higher the skill score, the easier it will be to pass corresponding skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} reflètent la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'un personnage à résoudre différents types de problèmes : gérer l'équipement, détecter de petits détails, ouvrir des conteneurs verrouillés et même influencer des conversations. Le score d'une compétence détermine le degré de maîtrise d'un personnage : plus il est élevé, plus il est facile pour lui de réussir les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de compétences correspondants.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}代表角色解决各种问题的能力，包括装备管理、寻找线索、解锁宝箱，有时甚至会影响对话的走向。{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}技能数值代表角色的熟练程度，数值越高，角色越容易通过相应的技能{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g} reflect a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to solve various problems: manage equipment, detect small details, open locked containers, and even influence conversations. A skill score determines how proficient a character is — the higher the skill score, the easier it will be to pass corresponding skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}代表角色解决各种问题的能力，包括装备管理、寻找线索、解锁宝箱，有时甚至会影响对话的走向。{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}技能数值代表角色的熟练程度，数值越高，角色越容易通过相应的技能{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。
技能代表一个生物执行某种行动的能力，例如爬上一堵墙、潜行穿过一条走廊或发现入侵者。一个生物在某一项技能上拥有的等级代表了其对该技能的擅长程度。

languages.text: Навыки отражают возможности персонажа решать различные задачи: управляться с техникой, подмечать мелкие детали, открывать запертые контейнеры и даже влиять на своих собеседников. Показатель навыка определяет, насколько хорошо персонаж владеет им — чем выше значение навыка, тем проще будет совершать связанные с ним проверки.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g} reflect a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to solve various problems: manage equipment, detect small details, open locked containers, and even influence conversations. A skill score determines how proficient a character is — the higher the skill score, the easier it will be to pass corresponding skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

languages.text: Las {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} reflejan la capacidad de un personaje de resolver distintos problemas: gestionar equipamiento, detectar detalles menores, abrir contenedores cerrados o incluso influir en las conversaciones. La puntuación de habilidad determina el nivel de dominio del personaje: cuanto más alta sea, más fácil resultará superar las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de esa habilidad.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g} reflect a character's ability to solve various problems: manage equipment, detect small details, open locked containers, and even influence conversations. A skill score determines how proficient a character is — the higher the skill score, the easier it will be to pass corresponding skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Las {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} reflejan la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de un personaje de resolver distintos problemas: gestionar equipamiento, detectar detalles menores, abrir contenedores cerrados o incluso influir en las conversaciones. La puntuación de habilidad determina el nivel de dominio del personaje: cuanto más alta sea, más fácil resultará superar las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de esa habilidad.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}はキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を反映しており、装備の管理、細かな事柄の把握、施錠されたコンテナの開錠、そして会話に影響を与えるなど、様々な問題を解決する。スキルスコアによりキャラクターの熟練度が決まる。スキルスコアが高ければ高いほど、それに対応する{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を成功させるのが容易となる。

A skill score determines how proficient a character is — the higher the skill score, the easier it will be to pass corresponding skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}はキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を反映しており、装備の管理、細かな事柄の把握、施錠されたコンテナの開錠、そして会話に影響を与えるなど、様々な問題を解決する。スキルスコアによりキャラクターの熟練度が決まる。スキルスコアが高ければ高いほど、それに対応する{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を成功させるのが容易となる。
